title: SENEGAL QUALIFIES first African team to qualify for second round in Qatar 2022

author: [deleted]
text: got a feeling senegal will beat england if england end up in 1st place tonight

author: KaptainKek3
text: I want to say it will be an easy win for England but you can never be to sure during the world cup

author: Flabby-Nonsense
text: Hmm they could do - they’re certainly a talented enough team - but Senegal haven’t been defending set pieces very well and England A) are very good at them and B) tend to get a lot of them. Feel like that could make the difference.

author: TOTOORLOG
text:
They lost 2-0 to the worst Dutch team to ever walk in a football stadium. They will not win against England.

Saying this as a Dutchie.

author: VectorSouth
text:
All of our good players were out.
Sadio Mane is gone for the whole World Cup
Dia got subbed out
And Diallo was injured. (Which let them score that second goal)

author: TOTOORLOG
text: Yeah cool story bro. I did not say there wasn’t a logical explanation. I was just saying that there is no way you guys are gonna beat England if you can’t even defeat the Dutch.

author: VectorSouth
text: We might not beat England but in the Dutch game we weren't at our team's full potential
